nodes.text: Ussto Lingsnot was an Adnerem male and member of the Lingsnot family. Ussto managed to manipulate fourteen Sertar sector markets without generating even one slave rebellion, restructure forty-three planetary economies and was the major donor of his brother's school. During his spare time, he practiced Norky Chips, his favorite pastime.

Ussto Lingsnot was featured in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
